welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cheltenham, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic architecture, and vibrant cultural scene. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within the United States.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from North Philadelphia Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free by selecting the 'PNE Airport WiFi' network and accepting the terms and conditions.
